title: BARD - Karen Agnifilo Returns!
itunes:title: BARD - Karen Agnifilo Returns!
description:
Good friend of the show Karen Freidman Agnifilo returns to give us some insight into the ongoing turmoil at her former workplace, the Manhattan District Attorney's office, and we get her take on another breaking news story as well. 

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
content:encoded:
